trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance, text formatting, and behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o aspeto, formatação de texto e o comportamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> coluna do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é abstracta.

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridColumnStyle objects (the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos de DataGridColumnStyle (o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) é acedida através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control automatically creates a collection of DataGridColumnStyle objects for you when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to an appropriate data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo cria automaticamente uma coleção de objetos de DataGridColumnStyle de quando definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>propriedade a uma origem de dados adequada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from DataGridColumnStyle: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos criados são, na verdade, instâncias de uma das seguintes classes que herdam DataGridColumnStyle: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>

trans-unit.source: To format the data display, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class to one of the formatting values.
trans-unit.target: Para formatar a apresentação de dados, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>classe para um dos valores de formatação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os valores válidos de formatação, consulte [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [data personalizada e cadeias de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also create your own set of DataGridColumnStyle objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode criar o seu próprio conjunto de objetos de DataGridColumnStyle e adicioná-los ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: When you do so, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each column style to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data.
trans-unit.target: Ao fazê-lo, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>de cada estilo de coluna para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>para sincronizar a apresentação de colunas com os dados reais.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create DataGridColumnStyle objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre criar objetos de DataGridColumnStyle e adicione-a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, DataGridColumnStyle objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor à coleção, DataGridColumnStyle objetos gerados automaticamente para si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new DataGridColumnStyle objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, será emitida uma exceção se tenta adicionar novos objetos DataGridColumnStyle com duplicados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, the class created depends on the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> associated with the DataGridColumnStyle object.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma das classes derivadas é instanciada por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo, a classe criada depende o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>do <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>associado ao objeto DataGridColumnStyle.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>com o respetivo <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>definido como `System.Boolean` será associado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of any DataGridColumnStyle, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de qualquer DataGridColumnStyle, utilize o <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create your own column classes, you can inherit from DataGridColumnStyle.
trans-unit.target: Para criar as suas próprias classes de coluna, pode herdar DataGridColumnStyle.

trans-unit.source: You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> class, which hosts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode querer fazê-lo para criar colunas especiais que alojam os controlos, conforme exemplificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>classe, os anfitriões a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can host an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode alojar um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>controlar para mostrar imagens nas colunas, ou pode criar o seus próprios controlo de utilizador para o anfitrião na coluna.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the DataGridColumnStyle shouldn't be confused with that of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade do DataGridColumnStyle não deve ser confundida com que o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the DataGridColumnStyle contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>contém as propriedades e métodos adequados para a criação de esquema de uma tabela de dados, o DataGridColumnStyle contém as propriedades e métodos relacionados com o aspeto de uma coluna individuais no ecrã.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: If a row contains a <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, the text displayed in the column can be set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se uma linha contém um <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, o texto apresentado na coluna pode ser definido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridColumnStyle class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridColumnStyle também lhe permite especificar o comportamento de uma coluna enquanto os dados que está a ser alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>métodos suspender temporariamente o desenho da coluna enquanto as atualizações de grandes dimensões que estão a ser efetuadas aos dados da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability.
trans-unit.target: Sem esta funcionalidade, todas as alterações em cada célula da grelha deverá ser imediatamente desenhada; Isto pode ser distrair os leitores para o utilizador e uma responsabilidade de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: Vários métodos permitem a monitorização da coluna como o é editado pelo utilizador, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das propriedades e métodos da classe são adaptados para controlar o aspeto de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: But a few, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Mas alguns, tal como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>permitem-lhe examinar e altere o valor numa célula especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>|`HorizontalAlignment.Left`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|The string "(null)"| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor predefinido | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>| `HorizontalAlignment.Left`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>| A cadeia "(null)" | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you must first get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the data source of the table to which the column will be added.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, tem primeiro de obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>da origem de dados da tabela à qual será possível adicionar a coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: See the `CurrencyManager` and `BindingManager` for details on getting specific `CurrencyManager` objects for a form.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o `CurrencyManager` e `BindingManager` para obter detalhes sobre a obtenção de específico `CurrencyManager` objetos para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, you can then get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> that will supply the data for the column.
trans-unit.target: Do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, em seguida, pode obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>que irá fornecer os dados da coluna.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following read/write properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/escrita foram inicializadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>|`HorizontalAlignment.Left`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|"(null)"| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>| `HorizontalAlignment.Left`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|" (nulo) "| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that provides the attributes for the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que fornece os atributos para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, inicia um pedido para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Abort method is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método de abortar é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>método devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the column value is rolled back to its previous value.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o valor de coluna é revertido para o valor anterior.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> must end any editing operations before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>tem de terminar quaisquer operações edição antes de regressar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Use the Abort method to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de abortar para realizar esta tarefa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control indirectly invokes Abort if its `ShouldAbort` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo invoca indiretamente abortar se respetivo `ShouldAbort` parâmetro está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row number upon which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha no qual está a ser interrompida uma operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text in a column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto numa coluna.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Valid options include <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valid options include <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Suspends the painting of the column until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Suspende o desenho da coluna até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the BeginUpdate method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando são feitas muitas alterações para o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle (se as alterações nos atributos de coluna ou os dados apresentados pelo controlo), deve invocar o método BeginUpdate para parar temporariamente o desenho do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: Isto resulta em menos distraction para o utilizador e um ganhos de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Depois de tem sido feitas todas as atualizações, invoque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>método para retomar o desenho do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> does not have a valid data source, or if this column is not mapped to a valid property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Emite uma exceção se a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> não tem uma origem de dados válido ou se esta coluna não está mapeada para uma propriedade válida na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> to check.

trans-unit.source: The value is .
trans-unit.target: The value is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for this column is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para esta coluna é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that the user has begun editing the column.
trans-unit.target: Informa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que o utilizador começou a edição da coluna.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>método permite o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo para mostrar um lápis no cabeçalho de linha, que indica que a linha estão a ser editado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that hosted by the column.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the painting of columns suspended by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Retoma o desenho de colunas suspenso ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando são feitas muitas alterações para o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle (se as alterações nos atributos de coluna ou os dados apresentados pelo controlo), deve invocam a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>método para parar temporariamente o desenho do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: Isto resulta em menos distraction para o utilizador e um ganhos de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the EndUpdate method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Depois de tem sido feitas todas as atualizações, invocar o método de EndUpdate para retomar o desenho do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> into the column.
trans-unit.target: Introduz um <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the user presses ALT+0 to allow a column to enter the appropriate null value.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando o utilizador prime ALT +&0; para permitir que uma coluna introduzir o valor nulo adequado.

trans-unit.source: For example, when called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value is inserted into the column.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando chamado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, apropriados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>valor é inserido na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The EnterNullValue has no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: O EnterNullValue não tem nenhum comportamento predefinido.

trans-unit.source: When inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, override the method to enter `null` in a column.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, substitua o método introduzir `null` numa coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column's font changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o tipo de letra da coluna é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the column's font.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura do tipo de letra da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The height of the font, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura do tipo de letra, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: If no font height has been set, the property returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's font height; if that property hasn't been set, the default font height value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control is returned.
trans-unit.target: Não se tiver sido definida altura nenhum tipo de letra, a propriedade devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> altura de tipo de letra do controlo; se essa propriedade não foi definido, o valor de altura de tipo de letra predefinido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value in the specified row from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor na linha especificada de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the data source for the column is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events to determine when a row or column value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados para a coluna é uma <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, utilize o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>eventos para determinar quando um valor de linha ou coluna foi alterada.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> containing the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> que contém os dados.

trans-unit.source: The row number containing the data.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha que contém os dados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing the value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém o valor.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> hasn't been set yet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> ainda não foi definida ainda.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the minimum height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a altura mínima de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The minimum height of a row.
trans-unit.target: A altura mínima de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the height used for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a altura utilizada para automaticamente redimensionar colunas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A> will usually be invoked from a mouse down event to resize a column's height for a long string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A>, normalmente, irá ser invocada a partir de um rato para baixo de evento ao redimensionar a altura de uma coluna de uma cadeia de comprimento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An object value for which you want to know the screen height and width.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de objeto para o qual pretende saber a largura e altura do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The height used for auto resizing a cell.
trans-unit.target: A altura utilizada para automaticamente o redimensionamento de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the width and height of the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a largura e altura do valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The width and height are used when the user navigates to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> using the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura e altura são utilizados quando o utilizador navega para <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> utilizando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use GetPreferredSize to determine the width a column should resize to, given a particular string or numeral.
trans-unit.target: Utilize GetPreferredSize para determinar a largura da que coluna deverá ser redimensionada para, fornecida uma cadeia específica ou numeral.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: Um valor de objeto para o qual pretende saber a largura e altura do ecrã.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as dimensões da célula.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The HeaderText property is typically used to display a caption that is different from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value isn't easily understandable.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HeaderText é normalmente utilizada para apresentar uma legenda que é diferente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor não é facilmente compreensível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can change the HeaderText to "First Name" when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value is "FName".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode alterar o HeaderText para "Nome do próprio" quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor é "FName".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that is displayed as the column header.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que é apresentada como o cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If it is created by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>, the default value is the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> used to create the column.
trans-unit.target: Se for criada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>, o valor predefinido é o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> utilizado para criar a coluna.

trans-unit.source: If it is created by the user, the default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se for criada pelo utilizador, a predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Redraws the column and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: Redesenha a coluna e faz com que uma mensagem de paint sejam enviados para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method is typically called after an editing operation is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O método Invalidate é normalmente denominado após uma operação de edição é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call the method when implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar o método quando implementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data member to map the column style to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do membro de dados para mapear o estilo de coluna a.

trans-unit.source: The comparison used to match the MappingName to the data member is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: A comparação utilizada para fazer corresponder o MappingName para o membro de dados é sensível.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is used to render the data in the indicated data member whenever the data source matches the one indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that contains this column style.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>é utilizado para compor os dados no membro de dados indicado sempre que a origem de dados corresponde à indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>que contém este estilo de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: The MappingName property is usually set to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MappingName normalmente está definida como <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data member to map the column style to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro de dados para mapear o estilo de coluna a.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>valor alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que é apresentado quando a coluna contém <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>dessa classe <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>propriedade determina se uma coluna pode conter valores nulos.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor for an example of using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A>construtor para obter um exemplo de utilização <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data in the column can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados na coluna podem ser editados.

trans-unit.source: Make a column read-only if it contains a primary key or if its value is generated automatically (as when the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Torne uma coluna só de leitura se este contiver uma chave primária ou se o valor for gerado automaticamente (como quando o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`).</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Similar read-only properties exist on other classes, each allowing more control over the access to data.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades só de leitura semelhantes existem no outras classes, cada permitir mais controlo sobre o acesso a dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control can be set to read-only mode by using its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> property; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class has a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property for restricting data updates.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo pode ser definido para o modo só de leitura com o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>também tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>classe tem um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade para restringir as atualizações de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the data cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se os dados não podem ser editados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Allows the column to free resources when the control it hosts is not needed.
trans-unit.target: Permite que a coluna para libertar recursos quando o controlo nele alojado não é necessária.

trans-unit.source: If you create a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you will often use the derived class to host a control that is used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Se criar uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, muitas vezes, irá utilizar classe derivada para alojar um controlo que é utilizado para editar os dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: You should override the ReleaseHostedControl method to release any references to the control in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Deverá substituir o método ReleaseHostedControl para quaisquer referências para o controlo de versão para libertar recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derived class uses this method to release the reference to the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>derivados de classe utiliza este método para libertar a referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> alojada</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*> to its default value, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Repõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>ao valor predefinido, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utiliza este método se estiver a criar ou um designer para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, ou criar o seus próprios controlo incorporando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by derived classes to do special processing when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is added to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, este método é substituído pelo classes derivadas para fazer um processamento especial quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>é adicionado à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses this method to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> as a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>utiliza este método para adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>como subordinado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>método permite o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlo para mostrar um lápis no cabeçalho de linha, que indica que a linha estão a ser editado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>
